snippet: Republicans have called for the department to investigate the deletions, but the deal with the specialist, Paul Combetta, makes it unlikely that the request will go far....
abstract: Summary of FBI investigation into Hillary Clinton's personal email account reveals Justice Dept granted immunity to Paul Combetta, computer specialist who deleted Hillary Clinton's emails against congressional order to preserve them.

byline.original: By ADAM GOLDMAN and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

lead_paragraph: Republicans have called for the department to investigate the deletions, but the deal with the specialist, Paul Combetta, makes it unlikely that the request will go far.

headline.main: Justice Dept. Granted Immunity to Specialist Who Deleted Hillary Clinton’s Emails
headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Struck Deal With Deleter of Emails
